Pre-Game Insights: The Men in Blue registered a thrilling 2-run win over the visitors in the series opener at Wankhede Stadium.
Post-Match Reflections: Another excellent game of cricket but this time it was Sri Lanka who get over the line and levelled the three-match series 1-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second T20I match between India and Sri Lanka will take place on January 5, Thursday.
